Python for Data Science

A comprehensive guide to Python programming, focusing on data science applications. It covers basic syntax, data types, variable assignment, strings, lists, and list operations, as well as NumPy arrays.

Key Concepts:

  • Variable assignment
  • String manipulation
  • List operations
  • Indexing and slicing
  • Data types
  • NumPy arrays
  • Array creation
  • Data manipulation
  • File input/output
  • Sorting algorithms
